column4: has anyone experienced a serious slowdown on nautilus in the hoary version?
opening a folder takes like 10 seconds and more
I already created a new user to check if it might a setting, but it had no effect
found why nautilus is so slow at opening folders
my question now is: why isn't nautilus dependent on gamin?
shouldn't the nautilis package have a dependency to the gamin package?
well installing gamin made nautilus react again
yea, I know, there's no good reason why not to make it a dependency
really, fam should be a dependency, gamin is just a replacement
